title: Cy Young Sov350 and two WaJo portraits
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Cy Young Sov350 and two WaJo portraits
posts.post_content:
Prices listed reflect a no-fee payment method.  I have to collect sales tax from WA state buyers.

WaJo PSA 4 $4500
Cy Sov350 PSA 2.5 $2400
WaJo SGC 2 $1600 SOLD
Wow, that's a beauty!  Good luck Luke.

thanks Bob!

Bump for new cards and a price drop on the PSA 4
